boofcv.alg.feature.detect.grid
Class FitGaussianPrune

java.lang.Object
  boofcv.alg.feature.detect.grid.FitGaussianPrune

public class FitGaussianPrune
extends java.lang.Object

Given a histogram of pixel intensity values and a valid range of indexes in the histogram, compute the mean and standard deviation. Prune bins which go outside the preset threshold.

Author:
Peter Abeles

Field Detail

indexLow

protected int indexLow

indexHigh

protected int indexHigh
Constructor Detail

FitGaussianPrune

public FitGaussianPrune(int maxIterations,
                        double thresholdSigma,
                        int minSeparation)
Parameters:
maxIterations - Maximum number of iterations. Try 20
thresholdSigma - Number of standard deviations a point is away for it to be pruned. Try 4
minSeparation - A bin will not be pruned if it is this close to the mean. 1 or 3 typically
Method Detail

process

public void process(IntensityHistogram h,
                    int low,
                    int high)
Computes statistics of pixel intensity values inside histogram. Valid range is indexLow <= i < indexHigh

Parameters:
h - Histogram being processed
low - Index of the lower bound being analyzed
high - Index of the upper bound being analyzed
